select a.*,group_concat(DISTINCT u.userName) userName,group_concat(DISTINCT c.companyName) companyName from article a,`user` u,company c where a.articleStatus=1 and ((case when a.articleUsersType=2 then a.usersId=u.id end) or (case when a.articleUsersType=1 then c.id=a.usersId end)) group by a.id order by a.articleStatus,articleTime desc limit 5

select d.*,group_concat(DISTINCT u.userName) userName,group_concat(DISTINCT c.companyName) companyName,d.discussUsersId,discussUserName from discuss d,`user` u,company c,(select u.id,u.userName discussUserName from discuss d,`user` u where d.discussUsersId=u.id) cd where d.discussStatus=1 and d.discussUsersId=cd.id and ((case when d.discussSendType=2 then d.discussBySendId=u.id end) or (case when d.discussSendType=1 then c.id=d.discussBySendId end)) group by d.id order by d.discussStatus,discussTime desc limit 5
